Feature Highlight

OpenShift

JBoss Tools for OpenShift offers a feature complete environment to work with OpenShift. From developing to deploying, JBoss Tools provides you a fully fledged environment for your project and aligns with the standard workflows within Eclipse.

Read more...

Latest news

Observations from two year of ping-backs from JBoss Tools users
Max Rydahl Andersen

Almost two years ago we started including an opt-in ping-back functionallity to JBoss Tools and Developer Studio installations. The ping-back has in that time given us a lot of good and sometimes surprising information about our users. In this blogpost I want to give you the highlights of these observations.

Read more...

Upcoming Events

Face-to-Face Team Meeting
September 2012 in Brno, Czech Republic

Most of the team members will get to Brno (Czech Republic) for the annual face-to-face meeting, where the roadmap and features for the upcoming version of JBoss Tools and JBoss Developer Studio will be discussed.

Devoxx
November 12th til 16th 2012 in Antwerp, Belgium

Some team members will present the cool features of JBoss Developer Studio 5.0, and maybe even more ;-)

Read more...
EclipseCon Europe
October 23-25, 2012 in Ludwigsburg, Germany

Some team members will get to EclipseCon to talk about m2e-wtp, OpenShift, Forge, Tycho.
